summary: RE: 2017 KIA SPORTAGE EX.  THE REAR TURN SIGNALS AND THE BACK-UP LIGHTS ARE IN-CONSPICUOUSLY LOCATED. 16" LOWER THAN TAIL/BRAKE LIGHTS AND LOWER THAN LICENSE PLATE DEEMS A PROBABLE TRAFFIC SAFETY HAZARD. THE 9" CURVED LENSES ILLUMINATE APPROX 2-3 " IN THE REAR AND APPROX 6-7" ON THE SIDE. A CERTAIN DAYTIME HAZARD. VERY POOR ENGINEERING  THIS PROBABLE UNSAFE HAZARD TAKES PLACE EVERY TIME THE TURN SIGNALS ARE APPLIED OR THE VEHICLE IS IN REVERSE.  AN ACCIDENT HAS NOT OCCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY TO THIS COMPLAINT...YET. THIS COMPLAINT IS ONGOING SINCE I PURCHASED THE VEHICLE, 5/17/2017. PLEASE INVESTIGATE AND RETURN FURTHER INFORMATION. THANK YOU
